topic.title: Close New Payment page: FTS03.01.01.02
topic.shortdesc: Close New Payment page step close the page without saving payment order.

body.p: Close New Payment page step has following parameters and methods:
Step Persistent ID (create unique ID within manufacturer domain):
Step Life Cycle Status (select inReview or Released ): inReview
Step is a part of what business Task (select):
Step is represented by what UI control:
Step is a part of what software component (select): no component
Step may be accessed through what connector (select): no connector
Step may be accessed (step calling) using what API method (select reference pages): no API
Step has DTO Access Level (select): no level
